description: System-generated unique identifier for each reference definition row. Enables consistent referencing and maintenance of parentâ€“child relationship metadata.
Name of the source entity or view acting as the parent in a defined relationship. Indicates where the referenced field resides for metadata-driven joins in fleet reporting.
Field within the parent entity used for the relationship, typically the key or attribute referenced by the child. Supports consistent join logic across reports.
Name of the dependent entity or view participating as the child in the relationship. Identifies the dataset that links to the parent for analysis and reporting.
Field within the child entity that links back to the parent field, usually a foreign key or comparable reference. Drives join conditions in fleet reports.
